00020 #if !defined (_WAVE_H)
00021 #define _WAVE_H
00022 
00023 // standard include files
00024 #include <stdio.h>
00025 
00026 // WAVE format identification tags
00027 #define _HEADER "RIFF"
00028 #define _CHUNK "WAVE"
00029 #define _SUB_CHUNK_1 "fmt "
00030 #define _SUB_CHUNK_1_SIZE 16
00031 #define _SUB_CHUNK_2 "data"
00032 #define _AUDIO_FORMAT 1
00033 #define _BITS_PER_SAMPLE 16
00034 
00035 class Wave {
00036     private:
00037         // file offset positions for .wav header
00038         static const long OFFSET_CHUNK_ID = 0;                  // Microsoft(R) RIFF (Resource Interchange File Format) specification for multimedia files
00039         static const long OFFSET_CHUNK_SIZE = 4;                // total data size (header + subchunks)
00040         static const long OFFSET_FORMAT = 8;                    // "WAVE" format tag identifier
00041         static const long OFFSET_SUBCHUNK1_ID = 12;         // header chunk ID
00042         static const long OFFSET_SUBCHUNK1_SIZE = 16;   // header chunk size
00043         static const long OFFSET_AUDIO_FORMAT = 20;         // compression format PCM = 1
00044         static const long OFFSET_NUM_CHANNELS = 22;         // number of audio channels mono = 1, stereo = 2
00045         static const long OFFSET_SAMPLE_RATE = 24;              // sampling rate 8000, 11025, 22050, 44100 etc
00046         static const long OFFSET_BYTE_RATE = 28;                // number of bytes per second
00047         static const long OFFSET_BLOCK_ALIGN = 32;              // bytes for each sample of all channels combined
00048         static const long OFFSET_BITS_PER_SAMPLE = 34;  // bites for each sample
00049         static const long OFFSET_SUBCHUNK2_ID = 36;         // data chunk ID
00050         static const long OFFSET_SUBCHUNK2_SIZE = 40;   // data chunk size
00051         static const long OFFSET_DATA = 44;                         // data chunk
00052     protected:
00053         // wave file header parameters
00054         char ChunkID [4], Format [4], SubChunk1ID [4], SubChunk2ID [4];
00055             long ChunkSize, SampleRate, ByteRate, SubChunk1Size, SubChunk2Size, NumSamplesPerChannel;
00056             short AudioFormat, NumChannels, BlockAlign, BitsPerSample;
00057         // file pointer to wave
00058         FILE * pointerWaveFile;
00059     public:
00060         void waveRead (char * filename);
00061         void waveLoad (long startSampleIndex, long numSamples, short * data);
00062         void waveClose ();
00063         void waveWrite (const char * filename, short * data);
00064         void waveDownmix (short * data, short * dataDownMix);
00065         short getNumChannels ();
00066         long getNumSamplesPerChannel ();
00067         long getSampleRate ();
00068 };

00070 #endif
